doc_context:
path /v3/offchain/blockchain/estimate
opid offchainestimatefee
params None
sum estimate ledger to blockchain transaction fee
reqBody
schema offchainestimatefee
type object
required
senderaccountid
address
amount
props
senderaccountid
desc sender account id
maxlength 24
minlength 24
type string
address
desc blockchain address to send assets to for btc ltc and doge it is possible to enter list of multiple recipient blockchain addresses as a comma separated string
maxlength 10000
minlength 1
type string
amount
desc amount to be withdrawn to blockchain
maxlength 38
type string
pattern ddd
multipleamounts
desc for btc ltc and doge it is possible to enter list of multiple recipient blockchain amounts list of recipient addresses must be present in the address field and total sum of amounts must be equal to the amount field
type array
items
type string
pattern ddd
attr
desc used to parametrize withdrawal as a change address for left coins from transaction xpub or attr must be used
maxlength 256
minlength 1
type string
xpub
desc extended public key xpub of the wallet associated with the accounts
maxlength 150
minlength 1
type string
